video.title: Max Steel
video.synopsis: A teen with a special power called turbo energy joins a secret organization to prevent the evil Trans-Human Industries from taking over the world.

episodes.synopsis: While confronting a high school bully, new kid Max discovers he possesses special powers, which he inherited from his father.
episodes.title: Come Together: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: After Max meets Steel, his alien counterpart, Max goes out on a date with a pretty classmate and is attacked by the Elementor.
episodes.title: Come Together: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Max is captured by sinister Miles Dredd, who intends to destroy Max in order to fill up his own waning supply of Turbo energy.
episodes.title: Come Together: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Max learns about his mother's role in the experimental program. Dredd manages to release a noxious gas that turns those who inhale it into zombies.
episodes.title: Cleaning House

episodes.synopsis: Max must deal with an issue of keeping his secret identity as Max Steel, so Miles Dredd doesn't come after him through his friends and family to siphon his near limitless TURBO energy.
episodes.title: Secret Identity Crisis

episodes.synopsis: N-Tek researcher Berto has developed a superior portable weapons system for Max, but problems arise when it gets hacked by a mysterious green slime.
episodes.title: C.Y.T.R.O. Attacks!

episodes.synopsis: When a string of unusual water anomalies wreak havoc on Copper Canyon, Max Steel goes behind N-Tek's back to investigate.
episodes.title: Hard Water

episodes.synopsis: N-TEK brings in Max and Steel to the arctic where a starship is found of similar design to the Water Elementor from the previous episode.
episodes.title: The Thrill of the Hunt

episodes.synopsis: A damaged Ultra-Link turns masterful criminal Troy Winter into Extroyer, which is capable of absorbing the powers of various animals.
episodes.title: Extroyer Unleashed

episodes.synopsis: Max, Kirby and Sydney go to a flee market and encounter a goon harassing an elderly merchant selling Asian weaponry.
episodes.title: Live by the Sword

episodes.synopsis: Toxzon escapes from jail and seeks vengeance on Max Steel by literally wiping Copper Canyon from the map.
episodes.title: Supermania

episodes.synopsis: Max and Steel chase down some bad guys downtown who stole weapons from the Army.
episodes.title: Uncle Sam Wants You!

episodes.synopsis: When Air Elementor attacks N-Tek our heroes must defeat the powerful beast before he can infiltrate the base and free his fellow Elementors!
episodes.title: Elements of Surprise: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The now combined Elementors manage to escape, albeit without the alien power drives that Dredd is after, and they capture Uncle Forge.
episodes.title: Elements of Surprise: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When Max buys a car with some secret good hidden in it, it puts him on a collision course with Extroyer!
episodes.title: Driven

episodes.synopsis: Sydney Gardner finally finds out that Maxwell McGrath is actually Max Steel.
episodes.title: The Truth Hurts

episodes.synopsis: When a strange virus begins to infect Copper Canyon citizens Max does some digging and discovers that Toxzon is behind it all and that Molly, Max's mom, is the prime target because she was the one who fired him from his job at THI.
episodes.title: The Secret Admirer

episodes.synopsis: Steel is eager to learn more about Extroyer, since he is an Ultra-Link inside him. But when he leaves Max to investigate him, Extroyer scrambles his system and makes him malfunction in all sorts of funny ways.
episodes.title: Scrambled

episodes.synopsis: Max and Steel are in a road trip on the search to N-Tek's true mission, but instead, they find Dredd and Jason Naught who are looking for a transmitter that will show them all of N-Tek's locations.
episodes.title: X Marks the Spot

episodes.synopsis: When Toxzon's pet plastic goldfish goes missing he holds the world hostage by poisoning all the oceans until Fishy is found. So Max Steel and N-Tek tries to find out the case of Toxic Fish in the ocean.
episodes.title: Gone Fishin'

episodes.synopsis: Due to his super hero duties as of late, Max has been failing school.
episodes.title: Making the Grade

episodes.synopsis: When the Elementors can't stop arguing with themselves,they settle their differences by splitting up and hunting for Max Steel.
episodes.title: Split Decisions

episodes.synopsis: When N-Tek decides that they need assistance taking down Ultimate Elementor, they enlist an unlikely ally-Toxzon. Until Toxzon ends up joining with Dredd and Ultimate Elementor.
episodes.title: Pick Your Poison

episodes.synopsis: Max battles Extroyer with his new TURBO mode.
episodes.title: Thanks, I Think

episodes.synopsis: Miles Dredd, Jason Naught, Ultimate Elementor, Toxzon and Extroyer have team-up to destroy Max Steel and N-Tek as The Syndicate.
episodes.title: Earth Under Siege: Part One

episodes.synopsis: During the Syndicate's Attack at N-Tek, Max and Steel learned the truth from Ultimate Elementor.
episodes.title: Earth Under Siege: Part Two

episodes.synopsis: Max Steel and N-Tek have been expecting Makino to make his move, and he does when his messenger, Dredd, attacks Copper Canyon with deadly Ultralinks.
episodes.title: Ultralink Invasion: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Max attempts to rescue Steel from the clutches of Ultralink hunter Ven Ghan.
episodes.title: Ultralink Invasion: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Max and Steel find files about the Turbo Star, but they must be decrypted before they can be understood.
episodes.title: Dredd Ascendant

episodes.synopsis: Max Steel and N-Tek must stop Toxzon and a deadly new enemy named Plaztek from carrying out a nefarious plot to destroy the world's water supply.
episodes.title: Toxic Relationship

episodes.synopsis: Makino sends his deadliest general, Metal Elementor, to Earth to destroy Max Steel.
episodes.title: Full Metal Racket

episodes.synopsis: Max Steel must stop Extroyer from extroying the Ultralinks' deadly alien powers.
episodes.title: Animal Attraction

episodes.synopsis: As Max Steel and Dredd race to recover the first piece of the Turbo Star, Metal Elementor launches an attack on an underwater N-Tek base.
episodes.title: Deep Turbo Blue Sea

episodes.synopsis: Ordered to capture Max Steel at all costs, Elementor apprehends Steel and Ven Ghan, leaving it up to Max to rescue them both.
episodes.title: Ultralink Hunter

episodes.synopsis: Toxzon attempts to destroy Max Steel inside a deadly video game.
episodes.title: Digital Meltdown

episodes.synopsis: Max and Dredd race to recover the second piece of the Turbo Star in Copper Canyon's abandoned mines, which are haunted by the Copper Squatch!
episodes.title: Journey to the Center of Copper Canyon

episodes.synopsis: Mega Metal Elementor launches the perfect attack on Max Steel while he's vacationing on a South Pacific island.
episodes.title: Hot Zone

episodes.synopsis: Hollywood is filming "Turbo Blaster 2," the epic action-adventure sequel based on Max Steel.
episodes.title: Lights! Camera! Max!

episodes.synopsis: When Mega Elementor fries Steel's circuits, Max and Steel get caught in a memory spiral, experiencing Steel's past as if they were there.
episodes.title: The Legend of Ja'em Mk'Rah

episodes.synopsis: Makino's humanoid form arrives on Earth through a massive wormhole and leads a devastating attack as he tries to destroy Max Steel.
episodes.title: Makino Strikes: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: On the Destroyer in orbit around Earth, Max must save Steel from Makino.
episodes.title: Makino Strikes: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Max and Steel decide they need the Turbo Star to defend Earth against Makino.
episodes.title: Got Turbo Star?

episodes.synopsis: Just when it appears that Max is making friends with Butch the bully, three damaged Ultralinks bond with Sydney, Kirby and Butch.
episodes.title: My Best Friend Is an Ultralink

episodes.synopsis: During a battle with Max Steel, Extroyer manages to extroy him, creating a carbon copy of Max Steel!
episodes.title: Me, Myself and Extroyer

episodes.synopsis: Max and his classmates accidentally stumble upon a meteor that's a chunk of Takion, inadvertently alerting Mega Metal Elementor to its existence.
episodes.title: Definitely Fear the Reaper

episodes.synopsis: Not quite sure that it wants to keep fighting for the glory of Makino, an Ultralink hides from Mega Metal Elementor.
episodes.title: Torbolt the Terrible

episodes.synopsis: Max is going to the school prom with Sydney, forcing Steel to go as Max, much to Max's chagrin.
episodes.title: Reprogrammed

episodes.synopsis: Makino's planet ship is rapidly bearing down on Earth, and he's getting stronger as a result.
episodes.title: A Germ of an Idea

episodes.synopsis: The Black Star Council sends three deadly bounty hunters to capture the "evil" Steel, along with Max and Ven Ghan for aiding and abetting him.
episodes.title: Fugitives

episodes.synopsis: Feeling the pressure of Makino's approaching planet ship, Max Steel tells Forge that he wants to use the Turbo Star to destroy Makino.
episodes.title: The Great Turbo Star Caper

episodes.synopsis: Makino arrives, and he's not messing around. He has his Alphalink, which makes him virtually unstoppable.
episodes.title: Final Countdown:  Part 1

episodes.synopsis: To save the planet, Max Steel must battle Makino, buying time for Molly and Forge to put the finishing touches on the Turbo Star.
episodes.title: Final Countdown: Part 2
